specials.special_data: These are mostly settings that affect the entire application.

settings.comment: DO NOT MOVE THIS SETTING. IT NEEDS TO BE AT INDEX 1 IN THIS FILE!
settings.name: Soundpack
settings.description: The soundpack to use. These will change all the sounds for the app.

settings.name: Volume
settings.description: The volume of the sounds in the app.

settings.name: Frontend Port
settings.description: The port the frontend runs on.

settings.name: Fancy Traceback
settings.description: Whether to use a fancy traceback when an error occurs.

settings.name: Send Crash Reports
settings.description: Whether to send crash reports to the developers.

settings.name: Debug Mode
settings.description: Whether to enable debug mode when starting the UI.
